summary: endophytes associated with f. indica are of crucial importance in this regard. the study aims successful isolation, molecular identification of endophytic bacteria and their screening for bioactive metabolites quantification. reducing power (RP) 206 g/mg of extract and 2, 2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl free radical scavenging activity with 98.7 g/mL IC50 value. an Enterobacter cloaca was active against Leishmania tropica with IC50 value of 1.4 g/mg extracts.
